security:
Revealing sources like LNERGO (confidential) and
BKHERALD (sensitive asset) could compromise their
operations. Also, details of BPP members' travels and
living arrangements could endanger individuals. Mentioning
'ALLEGED EFFORTS O'NEAL TO SPREAD CONFUSION' might reveal
counterintelligence tactics.
summary:
This message relays information regarding George
Lorenzo Matthews' mistaken arrest, BPP member travels,
and the whereabouts of James Joseph Patterson and Pete
O'Neal; it seeks confirmation of travels outside Algiers.
summary_one_paragraph:
A classified message from CI/SO dated
February 6, 1973, disseminates intelligence concerning
various individuals, including George Lorenzo Matthews'
mistaken identity arrest in Tanzania, travel activities of
BPP members Felix Lindsay O'Neal and William Holder,
location reports on James Joseph Patterson in France with
Nathan Burns, and information from a BKHERALD asset about
Pete O'Neal's residence in Dar es Salaam. It requests
confirmation from the station in Algiers regarding the
travels of Wright and Holder, while also noting a possible
attempt by O'Neal to spread disinformation.
title: Travels and Locations of BPP Members
